organizations.name: central base post office delhi cantt vacancy details
central base post office delhi cantt

text: 7. (MTS) Gestetner Operator: 01 Post 8. MTS (Chowkidar): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 18-25 years for Post 8 & 9, between 18-27 years for remaining posts. Age relaxation 5 years is applicable to SC/ ST & for more information refer the notification.   Matriculation, Civilian Driving License for heavy vehicles & have two years experience of driving such vehicles for Post 1, Matriculation pass or equivalent from a recognized Board or Institution, certificate of minimum six month duration in the use ans maintenance of First Aid, Fire Fighting Appliances and Trailer Fire Pumps for Post 2, Matriculation from a recognized Board or Institution, three years experience as a fitter or certificate from Industrial Technical Institute recognized by the Government for Post 3, Matriculation pass or equivalent from a recognized Board or Institution and certificate from Industrial Training Institute or National Council of Vocational Training in the trade or three years experience as a Carpenter for Post 4 & for more information refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on Written examination, test/ interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 50/- (non refundable) crossed Indian Postal Order (IPO/ DD) in favour of the Commandant, The Infantry School, Mhow. Candidates applying for ST & Ex-serviceman vacancy and PH candidates are exempted from application fee. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their application in the prescribed format by affixing one recent passport size photograph (not more than 03 months old) duly attested by a Gazetted Officer, one additional photograph duly signed by the applicant with Name, Fathers Name & post applied for on the back side, one self addressed envelope duly affixed with appropriate postage stamps, self attested legible copies of all relevant certificates/ documents & envelope should be superscribed with “Application for the post of __” in Capital Letters should be sent by post to Presiding Officer, Application Scrutiny Board, The Infantry School, Mhow (MP) on or before 24-03-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application: 24-03-2017. For more details like vacancy details, location of exam, qualification, experience & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form 64 COY ASC (SUP) Type C Pune Jobs 2017 – Tinsmith, Carpenter & Other Posts : Government of India, Ministry of Defence, 64 COY ASC (SUP) Type C Pune has advertised a   Tinsmith, Carpenter & Labour/ Industrial Mazdoor vacancies on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed application format within 30 days from the date of advertisement.   qualification, selection process and   below… 64 COY ASC (SUP) Type C Pune Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 04 Name of the Posts: 2. Carpenter: 01 Post 3. Labour/ Industrial Mazdoor: 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be 18 to 25 years for General/ OBC candidates as on last date for receipt of application. Age relaxation is 3 years for OBC candidates as per Central Government Rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should have 10th pass or equivalent from a recognized Board, should be proficient in trade for S.No-1, 10th pass or equivalent from a recognized Board, should have knowledge of carpentry for S.No-2, 10th pass or equivalent from a recognized Board for S.No-3 Posts. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written test, skill test, medical fitness, verification of character. How to Apply : Eligible candidates can send their application in prescribed format along with photocopies of certificates/ testimonials in support of age, qualification, experience, profession, caste, character, 02 recent passport size photographs, self attested copies & in an envelope should be superscribed as “Application for the post of Industrial Tinsmith/ Carpenter/ Mazdoor (Unreserved – OBC)” by Registered/ Speed Post to Administrative Officer, 64 Coy ASC (Sup) Type ‘C’, No-1 Dr.Coyaji Road, Opp- Maratha War Memorial, Pune – 411001 within 30 days from the date of advertisement. Important Dates: Date of Advertisement: 25-02-2017 to 03-03-2017. Last Date for receipt of Application: Within 30 days from the date of advertisement. For more details like duration, fellowship and other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form - Controllerate of Quality Assurance (Metals) North 24 Parganas Jobs 2017 – Civilian Motor Driver & Technician Posts: Government of India, Ministry of Defence (DGQA), Controllerate of Quality Assurance (Metals) North 24 Parganas has advertised a   Civilian Motor Driver (Ordinary Grade) & Technician (Semi Skilled) vacancies. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed format within 30 days & for remote areas within 37 days from the date of publication of the advertisement in the Employment News. Other details like educational qualification, selection process &   below… Controllerate of Quality Assurance (Metals) North 24 Parganas Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 04 Name of the Posts: 1. Civilian Motor Driver (Ordinary Grade): 01 Post 2. Technician (Semi Skilled): 03 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be 18 – 27 years as on normal closing date for receipt of application. Age relaxation is admissible as per rules.   Matriculation (10th class pass) from any recognized Board, Professional Skill Driving, have knowledge of motor mechanics, general smartness and holding of a valid permanent license for driving cars and heavy vehicles, four years experience in driving (experience certificates obtained from the recognized organization) for S.No-1, Industrial Training Institute pass certificate in the specified trade or its equivalent Defence Services Tradesman Course approved as such by the Central Government or State Government for S.No-2 Posts. Selection Process : Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in Written Exam, Trade Test/ Skill Test, Medical Fitness. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their application in prescribed format (A-4 Size duly typed) in Hindi/ English and supported with self attested copies of the relevant mark sheets and certificates & in an envelope should be superscribed as “Name of the Post & Category” to The Controller, Controllerate of Quality Assurance (Metals), P.O Ichapur, Nawabganj, Dist- North 24 Parganas, West Bengal – 743 144 within 30 days & for remote areas within 37 days from the date of publication of the advertisement in the Employment News. Important Dates: Date of Advertisement: 11 to 17-03-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Application: Within 30 days from the date of publication of the advertisement in the Employment News. Last Date for Receipt of Application for remote areas: Within 37 days from the date of publication of the advertisement in the Employment News. For more details like vacancy details, pay & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form – 1 Central Base Post Office Delhi Cantt Jobs 2017 – Cook & Gardener Posts: Government of India, Ministry of Defence, 1 Central Base Post Office, Delhi Cantt has published   Cook & Gardener vacancies for Group C. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format within 30 days from the date of publication of advertisement.   qualification, selection process &   below…. 1 Central Base Post Office Delhi Cantt Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 03 Name of the Post: 1. Cook: 02 Posts 2. Gardener: 01 Post Age Limit : Candidates age limit should be between 18 – 25 years for the general category candidates as on last date for receipt of application. Age relaxation is applicable OBC candidates as per Govt rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should have Matriculation passed or equivalent from recognised Education Board and must have knowledge of Indian Cooking and proficiency in trade for Post No. 01 & Matriculation passed or equivalent from recognised Education for Post No. 02 with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written examination. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their application on plain paper duly typed or neatly hand written in prescribed format with 03 latest photographs (Not taken before 03 months) (01 will be pasted at the space provided in the application and 02 photographs will be enclosed separately) along with self certified photocopies of date of birth certificate, educational/ qualification certificate, mark sheet, experience certificate, caste certificate and 02 self addressed envelopes should be enclosed with the application to the Commandant, 1 Central Base Post Office, Pin – 900 056, C/o 56 APO within 30 days from the date of publication of advertisement. Important Dates: Date of Advertisement: 25-02-2017 to 03-03-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Application: within 30 days from the date of publication of advertisement. For more details like pay scale, experience, reservation, desirable qualification & other information click on the link given below….
